metadata.abstractText: A modelling language is decribed which is suitable for the correlation of information when the underlying functional model of the system is incomplete or uncertain and the temporal dependencies are imprecise. Possibilistic logic and probability theory (as it is used in the applications targetted) satisfy these criteria.
